1 #include <iostream>
2 #include <cmath>
3 #include <vector>
4 #include <ros/ros.h>
5 #include <sensor_msgs/JointState.h>
6 #include <tf/transform_broadcaster.h>
7 #include "pumpkin_messages/analog_array.h"
8 
9 
10 //TODO: add the analog_read dependence to the package.xml
11 
12 #define MAX_N_A_READS 6
13 
14 uint16_t max_a_reads[MAX_N_A_READS];
15 uint16_t avg_a_reads[MAX_N_A_READS];
16 uint16_t min_a_reads[MAX_N_A_READS];
17 float angles[MAX_N_A_READS];
18 
19 float map(uint16_t x, uint16_t in_min, uint16_t in_max, float out_min, float out_max) {
20  return (x - in_min) * (out_max - out_min) / (in_max - in_min) + out_min;
21 }
22 
23 void analogReadCallback(const pumpkin_messages::analog_arrayConstPtr& msg) {
24  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_N_A_READS; i++) {
25  if (msg->an_read[i] > max_a_reads[i])
26  max_a_reads[i] = msg->an_read[i];
27  if (msg->an_read[i] < min_a_reads[i])
28  min_a_reads[i] = msg->an_read[i];
29  angles[i] = map((uint16_t)msg->an_read[i], min_a_reads[i], max_a_reads[i], 0.0, 180.0);
30  }
31  ROS_INFO("Angle: [%f]", angles[0]);
32 }
33 
34 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
35 
36  //initialization
37  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_N_A_READS; i++) {
38  max_a_reads[i] = 0;
39  avg_a_reads[i] = 0;
40  min_a_reads[i] = 1024;
41  angles[i] = 0.0;
42  }
43 
44  ros::init(argc, argv, "sensor_reads");
45  ros::NodeHandle n;
46 
47  ros::Subscriber sub = n.subscribe("a_reads", 1000, analogReadCallback);
48 
49  ros::Publisher joint_pub = n.advertise<sensor_msgs::JointState>("joint_states", 1);
50  tf::TransformBroadcaster broadcaster;
51 
52  ros::Rate loop_rate(30);
53 
54  const double degree = M_PI / 180;
55 
56  // robot state
57  double tilt = 0, tinc = degree, swivel = 0, angle = 0, height = 0, hinc =
58  0.005;
59 
60  // message declarations
61  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped odom_trans;
62  sensor_msgs::JointState joint_state;
63  odom_trans.header.frame_id = "odom";
64  odom_trans.child_frame_id = "axis";
65 
66  while (ros::ok()) {
67  //update joint_state
68  joint_state.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
69  joint_state.name.resize(3);
70  joint_state.position.resize(3);
71  joint_state.name[0] = "swivel";
72  joint_state.position[0] = swivel;
73  joint_state.name[1] = "tilt";
74  joint_state.position[1] = tilt;
75  joint_state.name[2] = "periscope";
76  joint_state.position[2] = height;
77 
78  // update transform
79  // (moving in a circle with radius=2)
80  odom_trans.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
81  odom_trans.transform.translation.x = cos(angle) * 2;
82  odom_trans.transform.translation.y = sin(angle) * 2;
83  odom_trans.transform.translation.z = .7;
84  odom_trans.transform.rotation = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromYaw(
85  angle + M_PI / 2);
86 
87  //send the joint state and transform
88  joint_pub.publish(joint_state);
89  broadcaster.sendTransform(odom_trans);
90 
91  // Create new robot state
92  tilt += tinc;
93  if (tilt < -.5 || tilt > 0)
94  tinc *= -1;
95  height += hinc;
96  if (height > .2 || height < 0)
97  hinc *= -1;
98  swivel += degree;
99  angle += degree / 4;
100 
101  // This will adjust as needed per iteration
102  loop_rate.sleep();
103  }
104 
105  //ros::spin();
106 
107  return 0;
108 }
